com.mapbox.services.api.navigation.v5.models

Class RouteStepProgress

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.services.api.navigation.v5.models.RouteStepProgress

  • public class RouteStepProgress
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RouteStepProgress(RouteLeg routeLeg, int stepIndex, com.mapbox.services.commons.models.Position userSnappedPosition)
      Constructor for the step progress.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getDistanceRemaining()
      Total distance in meters from user to end of step.
      double getDistanceTraveled()
      Returns distance user has traveled along current step in unit meters.
      long getDurationRemaining()
      Provides the duration remaining in seconds till the user reaches the end of the current step.
      float getFractionTraveled()
      Get the fraction traveled along the current step, this is a float value between 0 and 1 and isn't guaranteed to reach 1 before the user reaches the next step (if another step exist in route).

    • Method Detail

      • getDistanceTraveled

        public double getDistanceTraveled()
        Returns distance user has traveled along current step in unit meters.
        Returns:
        double value representing the distance the user has traveled so far along the current step. Uses unit meters.
        Since:
        2.1.0

      • getDistanceRemaining

        public double getDistanceRemaining()
        Total distance in meters from user to end of step.
        Returns:
        double value representing the distance the user has remaining till they reach the end of the current step. Uses unit meters.
        Since:
        2.1.0

      • getFractionTraveled

        public float getFractionTraveled()
        Get the fraction traveled along the current step, this is a float value between 0 and 1 and isn't guaranteed to reach 1 before the user reaches the next step (if another step exist in route).
        Returns:
        a float value between 0 and 1 representing the fraction the user has traveled along the current step.
        Since:
        2.1.0

      • getDurationRemaining

        public long getDurationRemaining()
        Provides the duration remaining in seconds till the user reaches the end of the current step.
        Returns:
        long value representing the duration remaining till end of step, in unit seconds.
        Since:
        2.1.0
